analysis.description:
CrowdsaleTokenExt.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/7/0xd8fbad653825c51d5cd9c747cd9a82d497cc41a4.sol#793-799) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,balance) (/unique_chucks/7/0xd8fbad653825c51d5cd9c747cd9a82d497cc41a4.sol#797)

SafeMath.safeSub (/unique_chucks/7/0xd8fbad653825c51d5cd9c747cd9a82d497cc41a4.sol#84-89) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- assert(bool)(b <= a) (/unique_chucks/7/0xd8fbad653825c51d5cd9c747cd9a82d497cc41a4.sol#87)

CrowdsaleTokenExt.timeLockedBalanceOf (/unique_chucks/7/0xd8fbad653825c51d5cd9c747cd9a82d497cc41a4.sol#822-825) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp < _start (/unique_chucks/7/0xd8fbad653825c51d5cd9c747cd9a82d497cc41a4.sol)
	- block.timestamp >= safeAdd(_start,_duration) (/unique_chucks/7/0xd8fbad653825c51d5cd9c747cd9a82d497cc41a4.sol)
UpgradeAgent.originalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/7/0xd8fbad653825c51d5cd9c747cd9a82d497cc41a4.sol#248)
